resources.string: This is a simple app to show you interesting locations to visit in Ghana
A 5-star hotel located in the heart of Accra, ready to accommodate you with the best service
Infinity pool at your disposal in this suburban paradise in the middle of the jungle
1 Yagbon Loop, Mole National Park - Tamale
4-star luxury hotel located in the green city of Ghana
City - Rain Tree Street, Lesley Opoku-Ware Drive, Kumasi
Large shopping centre with a variety of shops and brands to satisfy most customers
Spintex Road adjacent to Tema Motorway
New mall located in Kumasi to serve customers who love variety in one place
Heavenly atmosphere with delicious local cuisine
Local dishes served in the authentic Ghanaian city of Kumasi

Ghana\'s largest wildlife refuge established in 1958 and located in Tamale also has a motel in the middle of the park to receive its overnight visitors. Meet a wide range of wild forest animals like elephants, antelopes, deer, lions and wild monkeys.
This was one of three castles built in the Gold Coast during the days of slave trade. Take an emotional tour of the dungeons and imagine the suffering of our people who were sold into slavery.

The oldest and first slave trade post built in the Gold Coast in 1482 by the Portuguese. It is also the oldest European building in existence south of the Sahara. Close to Cape Coast and sure to get you teary-eyed as well after visiting the dungeons.
